main.name: Camila Braz
main.description: I am passionate about data and coding. Nowadays I work with data science projects using Python, R and SQL
main.bio: I have a strong interest in the field of data science and programming, with solid skills in R and Python for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization, as well as application development. I am constantly seeking challenges that push me to grow professionally, and I am always eager to learn. I am committed to delivering high-quality results in all my activities.
main.contactmessage: Let's schedule a meeting! It would be a pleasure to get to know you.
